profiles.skip_message: ERROR: DEPRECATION: The apache resource is deprecated This resource was removed in InSpec 4.0. (used at apache-baseline-0b5f21e668940d53e85c2ca36b41ba7ae18fac01/controls/apache_spec.rb:25)

controls.code:
control 'os-01' do
  impact 1.0
  title 'Trusted hosts login'
  desc "Rhosts/hosts.equiv files are a weak implemenation of authentication. Disabling the .rhosts and hosts.equiv support helps to prevent users from subverting the system's normal access control mechanisms of the system."
  describe command('find / -name \'.rhosts\'') do
    its('stdout') { should be_empty }
  end
  describe command('find / -name \'hosts.equiv\' ') do
    its('stdout') { should be_empty }
  end
  tag 'web'
  tag 'scope': 'OS'
  tag 'gtitle': 'TitleVal'
  tag 'satisfies': ['SRG-00006', 'SRG-00007']
  tag 'stig_id': 'RHEL-07-010050'
  tag 'cci': ['CCI-000048']
  tag 'hashhash': { "bad.one": [6] }
  tag 'documentable': false
  tag 'our_criticality': 8
end
controls.desc: Rhosts/hosts.equiv files are a weak implemenation of authentication. Disabling the .rhosts and hosts.equiv support helps to prevent users from subverting the system's normal access control mechanisms of the system.
controls.title: Trusted hosts login

results.code_desc: Command find / -name '.rhosts' stdout should be empty
Command find / -name 'hosts.equiv'  stdout should be empty
